0.title: Pipeline completion status

1.query:
fetch events | filter event.category == "pipeline" and event.status == "finished" and event.provider=="github.com" and event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" and event.type=="run" 
| fields vcs.repository.ref.name,cicd.pipeline.name,ext.pipeline.run.trigger
| filter in(vcs.repository.ref.name,$Repository) and in(cicd.pipeline.name,$Workflow) and in(ext.pipeline.run.trigger,$Trigger)
| summarize count()
1.title: âˆ‘ pipeline runs

10.query:
fetch events | filter event.category == "pipeline"  and  event.status == "finished" and event.provider=="github.com" and event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" and event.type=="run" 
| fields vcs.repository.ref.name,cicd.pipeline.name,ext.pipeline.run.trigger,duration
| filter in(vcs.repository.ref.name,$Repository) and in(cicd.pipeline.name,$Workflow) and in(ext.pipeline.run.trigger,$Trigger)
| summarize avg(duration)
10.title: Pipeline duration (Avg)

11.title: Pipeline triggers

12.query:
fetch events | filter event.category == "pipeline"  and event.status == "finished" and ext.pipeline.run.attempt > 1 and event.provider=="github.com" and event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" and event.type=="run"
| fields vcs.repository.ref.name,cicd.pipeline.name,ext.pipeline.run.trigger
| filter in(vcs.repository.ref.name,$Repository) and in(cicd.pipeline.name,$Workflow) and in(ext.pipeline.run.trigger,$Trigger)
| summarize count()
12.title: âˆ‘ Re-runs

14.query:
fetch events | filter event.category == "task"  and event.status == "finished" and event.provider=="github.com" and event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" and event.type=="build" | fieldsAdd steps_array=toArray(ext.task.steps) | expand steps_array | parse steps_array,"JSON:steps_data" 
| join [fetch events | filter  event.category == "pipeline"  and event.status == "finished" and event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" and event.type=="run" | fields cicd.pipeline.run.id,cicd.pipeline.name,vcs.repository.ref.name, ext.pipeline.run.trigger 
| filter  in(vcs.repository.ref.name,$Repository) and in(cicd.pipeline.name,$Workflow) and in(ext.pipeline.run.trigger,$Trigger) ], 
on:{cicd.pipeline.run.id}, prefix: "workflow." 
| fieldsAdd step.duration = toTimestamp(steps_data[completed_at]) - toTimestamp(steps_data[started_at]), 
step.name = steps_data[name], 
step.conclusion = steps_data[conclusion], 
step.status = steps_data[status], 
step.task.id = task.id,
step.task.name = task.name,
step.task.outcome = task.outcome,
step.task.cicd.pipeline.run.id = cicd.pipeline.run.id 
|  summarize failureRate=if(count() == 0, 0, else: toDouble(countIf(step.conclusion=="failure")) / toDouble(count())*100), by: {step.name, step.task.name} | filter failureRate>0 | sort  failureRate desc | limit 5
14.title: Error-prone steps | Top 5

15.query:
fetch events | filter event.category == "task"  and event.status == "finished" and event.provider=="github.com" and event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" and event.type=="build"
| join [fetch events | filter  event.category == "pipeline"  and event.status == "finished" and event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" and event.type=="run" | fields cicd.pipeline.run.id,cicd.pipeline.name,vcs.repository.ref.name, ext.pipeline.run.trigger 
| filter  in(vcs.repository.ref.name,$Repository) and in(cicd.pipeline.name,$Workflow) and in(ext.pipeline.run.trigger,$Trigger) ], 
on:{cicd.pipeline.run.id}, prefix: "workflow." 
| fieldsAdd steps_array=toArray(ext.task.steps) | expand steps_array | parse steps_array,"JSON:steps_data" 
| fieldsAdd step.duration = toTimestamp(steps_data[completed_at]) - toTimestamp(steps_data[started_at]), 
step.name = steps_data[name], 
step.conclusion = steps_data[conclusion], 
step.status = steps_data[status], 
step.task.id = task.id,
step.task.name = task.name,
step.task.outcome = task.outcome,
step.task.cicd.pipeline.run.id = cicd.pipeline.run.id | summarize percentile(step.duration,50), alias:Median ,by:{step.name, alias: StepName,step.task.name, alias: TaskName} | filter isNotNull(Median) | sort Median desc | limit 5
15.title: Steps by duration (p50) | Top 5

18.query:
fetch events | filter event.category == "task"  and event.status == "finished" and event.provider=="github.com" and event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" and event.type=="build" 
| join [fetch events | filter  event.category == "pipeline"  and event.status == "finished" and event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" and event.type=="run" | fields cicd.pipeline.run.id,cicd.pipeline.name,vcs.repository.ref.name, ext.pipeline.run.trigger 
| filter  in(vcs.repository.ref.name,$Repository) and in(cicd.pipeline.name,$Workflow) and in(ext.pipeline.run.trigger,$Trigger) ], 
on:{cicd.pipeline.run.id}, prefix: "workflow." 
| summarize Count=count() , by:{ext.task.runner.name} | sort Count desc | limit 5
18.title: Runners used | Top 5

19.query:
fetch events | filter  event.category == "pipeline"  and event.status == "started" and event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" and event.type=="run" 
| filter  in(vcs.repository.ref.name,$Repository) and in(cicd.pipeline.name,$Workflow) and in(ext.pipeline.run.trigger,$Trigger)  

| fields start_time,cicd.pipeline.run.id,ext.pipeline.run.attempt
| joinNested jobs=[fetch events | filter event.category == "task" and event.status == "started" and event.provider=="github.com" and event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" and event.type=="build" | fields cicd.pipeline.run.id,ext.task.run.attempt,start_time | sort start_time asc ],on: {cicd.pipeline.run.id,left[ext.pipeline.run.attempt]==right[ext.task.run.attempt]} 
| fieldsAdd timeToStart = jobs[0][start_time] - start_time
19.title: First pipeline job time-to-start

2.query:
fetch events | filter event.category == "pipeline"  and  event.status == "finished" and event.provider=="github.com" and event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" and event.type=="run"
| fields vcs.repository.ref.name,cicd.pipeline.name,ext.pipeline.run.trigger,duration
| filter in(vcs.repository.ref.name,$Repository) and in(cicd.pipeline.name,$Workflow) and in(ext.pipeline.run.trigger,$Trigger)
| summarize median(duration)
2.title: Pipeline duration (p50)

3.query:
fetch events | filter event.category == "task"  and event.status == "finished" and event.provider=="github.com" and task.outcome!="skipped" and event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" and event.type=="build"
| join [fetch events | filter  event.category == "pipeline"  and event.status == "finished" and event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" and event.type=="run" | fields cicd.pipeline.run.id,cicd.pipeline.name,vcs.repository.ref.name, ext.pipeline.run.trigger 
| filter  in(vcs.repository.ref.name,$Repository) and in(cicd.pipeline.name,$Workflow) and in(ext.pipeline.run.trigger,$Trigger) ], 
on:{cicd.pipeline.run.id}, prefix: "workflow." 
| summarize percentile(duration,50), alias:Median ,by:{task.name, alias: TaskName}| filter isNotNull(Median)  | sort Median desc | limit 5
3.title: Task duration (p50) | Top 5

4.query:
fetch events | filter event.category == "pipeline"  and event.status == "finished" and event.provider=="github.com" and event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" and event.type=="run" 
| fields vcs.repository.ref.name,cicd.pipeline.name,ext.pipeline.run.trigger,cicd.pipeline.run.outcome
| filter in(vcs.repository.ref.name,$Repository) and in(cicd.pipeline.name,$Workflow) and in(ext.pipeline.run.trigger,$Trigger)
| summarize failureRate=if(count() == 0, 0, else: toDouble(countIf(cicd.pipeline.run.outcome=="failure")) / toDouble(count())*100)
4.title: Failure Rate

5.query:
fetch events 
| filter event.category == "pipeline"  and event.status == "finished" and cicd.pipeline.run.outcome != "canceled" and event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" and event.type=="run" 
| filter in(vcs.repository.ref.name,$Repository) and in(cicd.pipeline.name,$Workflow) and in(ext.pipeline.run.trigger,$Trigger)
| summarize percentile(duration,50), alias:Median ,by:{cicd.pipeline.name, alias: name} | sort Median desc | limit 5
5.title: Pipeline duration (p50) | Top 5

6.query:
fetch events | filter event.category == "pipeline"  and event.status == "finished" and event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT"  and event.type=="run"
| filter in(vcs.repository.ref.name,$Repository) and in(cicd.pipeline.name,$Workflow) and in(ext.pipeline.run.trigger,$Trigger)
| summarize failureRate=if(count() == 0, 0, else: toDouble(countIf(cicd.pipeline.run.outcome=="failure")) / toDouble(count())*100), by: {vcs.repository.ref.name,cicd.pipeline.name }
| filter failureRate>0 | sort  failureRate desc | limit 5
6.title: Error-prune pipelines | Top 5

7.query:
fetch events | filter event.category == "task"  and event.status == "finished" and event.provider=="github.com" and event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" and event.type=="build"
| join [fetch events | filter  event.category == "pipeline"  and event.status == "finished" and event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" and event.type=="run" | fields cicd.pipeline.run.id,cicd.pipeline.name,vcs.repository.ref.name, ext.pipeline.run.trigger 
| filter  in(vcs.repository.ref.name,$Repository) and in(cicd.pipeline.name,$Workflow) and in(ext.pipeline.run.trigger,$Trigger) ], 
on:{cicd.pipeline.run.id}, prefix: "workflow." 
| summarize failureRate=if(count() == 0, 0, else: toDouble(countIf(task.outcome=="failure")) / toDouble(count())*100), by: task.name | filter failureRate>0 | sort  failureRate desc | limit 5
7.title: Error-prone tasks | Top 5

8.query:
fetch events | filter event.category == "pipeline"  and event.status == "finished" and event.kind == "SDLC_EVENT" and event.type=="run"
| filter in(vcs.repository.ref.name,$Repository) and in(cicd.pipeline.name,$Workflow) and in(ext.pipeline.run.trigger,$Trigger)
| fields 
Duration = duration,
Name = cicd.pipeline.name,
Status = cicd.pipeline.run.outcome,
Run_url = cicd.pipeline.run.url.full,
Run_attempt = ext.pipeline.run.attempt,
Run_trigger = ext.pipeline.run.trigger,
Start = start_time,
End = end_time,
Repository = vcs.repository.ref.name 
| sort Duration desc
8.title: Pipeline run details

variables.input:
fetch events
| filter event.category == "pipeline" and event.status == "finished" and event.provider=="github.com" and event.type == "run"
| summarize distinctRepositories = collectDistinct(vcs.repository.ref.name)
| expand distinctRepositories
| sort distinctRepositories

fetch events
| filter event.category == "pipeline" and event.status == "finished" and event.provider=="github.com" and event.type == "run"
| filter in(vcs.repository.ref.name, $Repository)
| summarize distinctWorkflows = collectDistinct(cicd.pipeline.name)
| expand distinctWorkflows
| sort distinctWorkflows

fetch events
| filter event.category == "pipeline" and event.status == "finished" and event.provider=="github.com" and event.type == "run"
| summarize distinctTriggers = collectDistinct(ext.pipeline.run.trigger)
| expand distinctTriggers
| sort distinctTriggers
